property.name: dfs.thrift.address
property.description: The address where the Thrift namenode server will listen to. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.thrift.datanode.address
property.description: The address where the Thrift datanode server will listen to. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.thrift.threads.min
property.descrition: Minimum number of Thrift server threads.

property.name: dfs.thrift.threads.max
property.descrition: Maximum number of Thrift server threads.

property.name: dfs.thrift.timeout
property.descrition: Timeout in seconds for Thrift server threads.
